text:
@ImranKhanPTI Dear respected Sir.
I am a PTI follower since 2011. Now due to covid-19 i have lost my job on 22march and my wife also with me on visit visa. I have done online registeration on 5th april but still i am waiting. Plzzz for God sake contact us we have nothing to stay here.
